name: Academics
description: Knowledge of liberal arts, social sciences, literature, history, etc.'

name: Athletics
description: Overall athletic coordination and ability. Climbing, jumping, balancing, wrestling, skiing, swimming, throwing, or catching.'

name: Battle
description: Strategy, tactics, and understanding military operations. A key skill in Mass Battles.'

name: Boating
description: Ability to sail or pilot a boat, ship, or other watercraft.'

name: Common Knowledge
description: General knowledge of a character’s world.'

name: Driving
description: The ability to control, steer, and operate ground vehicles.'

name: Electronics
description: The use of electronic devices and systems.'

name: Faith
description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Miracles).'

name: Fighting
description: Skill in armed and unarmed combat.'

name: Focus
description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Gifted).'

name: Gambling
description: Skill and familiarity with games of chance.'

name: Hacking
description: Coding, programming, and breaking into computer systems.'

name: Healing
description: The ability to treat and heal Wounds and diseases, and decipher forensic evidence.'

name: Intimidation
description: A character’s ability to threaten others into doing what she wants.'

name: Language
description: Knowledge and fluency in a particular language.'

name: Notice
description: General awareness and perception.'

name: Occult
description: Knowledge of supernatural events, creatures, history, and ways.'

name: Performance
description: Singing, dancing, acting, or other forms of public expression.'

name: Persuasion
description: The ability to convince others to do what you want.'

name: Piloting
description: Skill with maneuvering vehicles that operate in three dimensions, such as airplanes, helicopters, spaceships, etc.'

name: Psionics
description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Psionics).'

name: Repair
description: The ability to fix mechanical and electrical gadgets.'

name: Research
description: Finding written information from various sources.'

name: Riding
description: A character’s skill in mounting, controlling, and riding a tamed beast.'

name: Science
description: Knowledge of scientific fields such as biology, chemistry, geology, engineering, etc.'

name: Shooting
description: Precision with any type of ranged weapon.'

name: Spellcasting
description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Magic).'

name: Stealth
description: The ability to sneak and hide.'

name: Survival
description: How to find food, water, or shelter, and tracking.'

name: Taunt
description: Insulting or belittling another. Almost always done as a Test'

name: Thievery
description: Sleight of hand, pickpocketing, lockpicking, and other typically shady feats.'

name: Weird Science
description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Weird Science).'
